Summary: silver ball sitting outside daughters window
divs: Sighting Detailssent daughter to bed about 7:30 p.m and she came back out and said daddy there an airplane outside my window.so i went to look and there in the sky was a ball,bright and just sitting there not moveing just shineing like a star.i dont know the how far away it was but it look close,and no running lights no wings no tail no prepallers nothing just this ball of light sitting in the sky and video is sick.I am trying to get it on disk and maybe someone from mufon can putit on here and you guys can make the call yourself.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Eugene
There was one other sighting in Eugene on or around July 20th 2006
